opens up a lot more opportunities
because now you're moving into a
scenario where you didn't you don't want
to know what happened yesterday
you don't even just want to know what's
happening in real time but you want to
go step ahead and predictively
understand how your devices are behaving
how the sensors on your devices are
behaving and make corrective actions
avoid even before things starts falling
off for example so that's that's
something the value proposition when we
combine IOT and machine learning
